head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths SHEEN, EILEEN HALLEY

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths SHEEN, EILEEN HALLEY

block.p: SHEEN-Eileen Halley, 91, July 5th. Wife of the late Dr. Thomas Sheen. Mother of Eileen Khouw, Marie Minnick and Anne Sheen. Grandmother of Michael Khouw, Jeffrey Khouw, Larissa Markarian, Michele Minnick, and Hilary Minnick. Survived by brothers Leonard and William Halley. Services private. Donations to ARF and Boys Harbor Inc. in lieu of flowers.

SHEEN-Eileen Halley, 91, July 5th. Wife of the late Dr. Thomas Sheen. Mother of Eileen Khouw, Marie Minnick and Anne Sheen. Grandmother of Michael Khouw, Jeffrey Khouw, Larissa Markarian, Michele Minnick, and Hilary Minnick. Survived by brothers Leonard and William Halley. Services private. Donations to ARF and Boys Harbor Inc. in lieu of flowers.
